geneId.description: The ID to which the wildtypeExpression ontology term(s) is applied. For this submission, these will be genes.

evidence.description: one publication for which the annotation was made

whenExpressed.description: a collection of terms that when used together represent the 'when expressed' piece of an expression annotation.

whereExpressed.description: a collection of terms that when used together represent the 'where expressed' piece of an expression annotation.

assay.description: the MMO (ontology) id that represents the assay type of the expression, ie: in-situ.

items.description: for calculated submissions, this field represents the id of the genetic objects (allele or affectedGenomicModel) that this annotation is based on.
all the experimental conditions that participate with the disease annotation as defined by the conditionRelationType

negation.description: The negative qualifier for the annotation.

uncertainty.description: The uncertain qualifier for the annotation.

perturbedExpression.description: The expression observed under some perturbation, genetic and/or environmental.

items.description: Qualifier terms that describe additional aspects of expression strength (e.g., 'intense') or pattern (e.g., 'restricted').

nonWildtypeExpressionQualifierTermIds.description: Qualifiers describing non-wildtype expression relative to wildtype: e.g., 'increased', 'mislocalized'

expressionNote.description: Text associated with this expression statement.

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.

crossReference.description: intended to provide a link back to the MOD to see complete details of this expression annotation. Note: the accession number in this cross reference is not limited to the gene of interest in this annotation.
